name: OCED Stock Assessment
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'cd /workspaces/OCED_stock_assesment; [ -f .venv/bin/activate ] || python -m venv .venv; ACTLINE="source /workspaces/OCED_stock_assesment/.venv/bin/activate"; grep -qxF "$ACTLINE" ~/.bashrc || echo "$ACTLINE" >> ~/.bashrc; source /workspaces/OCED_stock_assesment/.venv/bin/activate; pgrep -f "streamlit run massive_tracker/ui_app.py" >/dev/null 2>&1 || (nohup streamlit run massive_tracker/ui_app.py --server.port 8501 --server.address 0.0.0.0 >/tmp/streamlit.log 2>&1 &); echo VENV_READY'
